overview:
Justin Rascoe has more than 8 years of combined experience in the technology sector. Prior to starting a Web Design business in 2008, Justin spent 5 years as a Business Analyst at Wachovia Corporation and has also held positions at General Electric and Goldman Sachs.â€¨

His varied background as a Student, Computer Support Technician, Business Analyst and Web Designer provide an excellent foundation for Justinâ€™s entrepreneurial endeavors and desire to motivate others to achieve their life goals.

Justin holds a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science and a Masters Degree in Instructional Technology from North Carolina A&T State University and is currently pursuing his Masters of Divinity at Wake Forest University. A big believer in education, Justin encourages others to actively pursue their dreams and maximize their God-given potential.
